doc.title: One Hell of a Night: Act One
doc.plot: As daylight gives way to evening, two young men, Radcliffe and Benny, are thrust into an unexpected situation beyond their control, as fate takes hold of their car and their night. The first disaster occurs when Rad and Benny are caught up in a case of mistaken identity and are wanted by the police, after a hit-and-run accident. To top that, they are held captive in their car as fate deals them an encroaching visit by a mysterious and silent Figure who takes charge of their trip. Unable to go to the police for help, due to their prior conflict, Rad and Benny must attempt to live through one hell of a night.
